definition: having no special distinction or quality, a piece of open land for recreational use in an urban area
details:
adjective
- having no special distinction or quality
= example: having no special distinction or quality
- belonging to or participated in by a community as a whole
- commonly encountered
= example: commonly encountered
= synonyms: usual
- being or characteristic of or appropriate to everyday language
= example: being or characteristic of or appropriate to everyday language
= synonyms: vulgar
- of or associated with the great masses of people
= example: of or associated with the great masses of people
= synonyms: unwashed
- to be expected
= synonyms: expectable
- lacking refinement or cultivation or taste
= synonyms: vulgar, rough-cut, coarse, uncouth
- common to or shared by two or more parties
= example: common to or shared by two or more parties
= synonyms: mutual
- of low or inferior quality or value
= synonyms: coarse
noun
- a piece of open land for recreational use in an urban area
= synonyms: green
